website_summaries.verdict: Can help reduce general aches and pains.
pros: Most common reports indicate this supplement helps with leg cramps and overall muscle pain
We love that it helps increase relaxation as well
Improves bone strength and overall health
cons: Some customers have difficulty with the pill's outer coating

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend that you try this
customer_reviews.text: This brand of magnesium is the only stuff that I will use, not only does it absorbs perfectly for a person with multiple autoimmune conditions with a secondary issue of absorption of nutrients, but it has also helped reduce my pain. If you happen to be someone who suffers from chronic pain conditions, I highly recommend that you try this, it is definitely better for your liver to try something like this rather than narcotics. Highly recommend this, in fact I even have my mom using it too.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Works Immediatelyand Continually to Relieve Cramps
customer_reviews.text: I used to suffer terribly from cramping in my hands, feet and lower legs. Yes, I'd wake up in the morning and, without notice even, I'd soon be yelling in pain. I read a book about the effects of magnesium (and magnesium with calcium) called "The Magnesium Miracle" and started taking this every morning with breakfast several years ago. I no longer have those painful episodes. Sometimes, rarely, during the day I might find my fingers cramping, but I immediately take one or two capsules (I keep them in my car, too) and within 20 minutes I'm continuing to carpenter or play tennis with no problem. Thank goodness for this supplement.
customer_reviews.author: James Charnock

customer_reviews.title: Works for constipation!
customer_reviews.text: Its a chelated compound with magnesium oxide base. So u may see some stomach discomfort. Its works fine with constipation though. If ur looking for magnesium as supplement other than constipation treatment, go for magnesium compound that doesnt have magnesium oxide cos magnesium oxide has very low absorption than other magnesium compunds like glycenate, citrate etc.
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it should be a good product
customer_reviews.text: Liked the way it was presented, but product smelled bad when opened and tasted worse! Wonder how long this product was left on the shelf of the seller before shipping it to me! Want to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sure something is rancid
customer_reviews.text: This stinks! And it tastes worse! I'm pretty sure one of the inactive ingredients (stearate?) was rancid when they put these together. I hope I can return these. awful.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Bateman

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the stomach
customer_reviews.text: Most magnesium supplements upset my digestion, and this formulation doesn't. It seems to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wojcik

customer_reviews.title: Good for my restless leg syndrome
customer_reviews.text: It completely STOPS my restless leg syndrome. Not a medical product but do your own research. Better take this than pharmaceuticals. Works in 30 minutes. Other magnesium supplements will NOT do this. It has to be this specific version of "chelated" magnesium.
customer_reviews.author: C. Moon

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: my doctor recommended magnesium to help with stress and anxiety. told me to take 1 pill at night time. Has really helped with my sleep pattern as well as keeping me regular
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as asporotate version
customer_reviews.text: Not half as effective as the solaray magnesium asporotate - would not buy again! We use it for headache and constipation prevention— needed at least a double dose and there’s a noticeable difference :(
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A.

customer_reviews.title: Solar mag
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite type of magnesium. Easily absorbed by the body and I don’t have any issues! It helps with sleep and keeps you calm. I’ve tried different types and different brands but this is by far the best kind.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Good Company. Good product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well respected company. All their products are higher level. I have been using them for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Sundisc

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: They are a little hard to swallow due to the size.
customer_reviews.author: joy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take
customer_reviews.text: I didnt like this product. Did not seem to work well with me.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Olmsted

customer_reviews.title: A Good Addition With Calcium
customer_reviews.text: I have just started using this magnesium. So far it seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Thiede

customer_reviews.title: High quality and great value
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other brands of magnesium and like Solaray the best. Arrives quickly after ordering and is a great product. I take it at night and it helps relax the tightness I feel after a long day
customer_reviews.author: lauren S

customer_reviews.title: like product
customer_reviews.text: good product. got it to help with migraines. I can tell a different. I also use this for other reasons
customer_reviews.author: Judy E.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I won't order this bottle again. The outer coating is difficult to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: rdheimark

customer_reviews.title: that all my supplements do not look alike.
customer_reviews.text: sorry i ordered a solaray product as all of their pills look the same and it is hard to distinguish one from the other so it will be the last time i order solaray!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a valuable supplement that's good for my heart.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It works well - it adds that "stop" leaver in your brain.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I order these for my mother and she is very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: QUEEN NEPTUNE

customer_reviews.title: Steer clear of Magnesium Stearate.
customer_reviews.text: This product is mixed with Mag Stearate. No bueno. This product gives me a wicked morning headache and stiff neck among a general-tired-feeling. Curious. I take this to reduce my headaches and sore muscles. I'll let the amazon public look up the stearic acid pros and cons. Makes me sick from my head to my toes. Wish that I would have know this before I hit "purchase."
customer_reviews.author: Kert

customer_reviews.title: Product is reasonably priced and seem to work well.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Still deciding if it's the best. Prices are great with Solaray.
customer_reviews.author: LMac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I use them for my anxiety and it balances me out pretty well
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Great brand!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I take a few a day. I used to get mild headaches a couple times a week. After some research found out I was probably magnesium deficient. After taking these my headaches are a lot less frequent! As far as I can tell these are high quality as well. Never had a problem with the Solaray brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery P.

customer_reviews.title: Regular and calm
customer_reviews.text: The most important vitamins in my shelf. I take 800 mg, 400 at night and 400 in the morning and it keeps me regular (yep that kind of regular) and calm as well.
customer_reviews.author: happy

customer_reviews.title: Great product and good price
customer_reviews.text: The body need lots of Magnesium and works well with the body to maintain regularity There are actually more bodily process which require magnesium over calcium
customer_reviews.author: Tony Biasillo

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. It seems to upset my stomach a little
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. It seems to upset my stomach a little. I'm going to keep taking it, maybe my stomach will calm down after a while. I don't think I will order this again though. We'll see how I feel in a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Marie M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff don't know what I would do without it. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Clara E Godard

customer_reviews.title: It's the best Magnesium on the market
customer_reviews.text: It's the best Magnesium on the market. I've tried many other brands. It is powder in a capsule, so it is easily absorbed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Alemshah

customer_reviews.title: Read possible side effects first
customer_reviews.text: This one was chosen for all its processing elements/features...chealated, etc only to find out that it’s too strong for my stomach. It probably works well & quickly is absorbed but it gave my sensitive stomach too much distress.
customer_reviews.author: Taison

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasant metallic taste in mouth and stomach upset.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately could not tolerate laxative effect and the terrible metallic taste in my mouth. Will eat foods highest in Mg as alternate.
customer_reviews.author: Martha G. Langlois

customer_reviews.title: No more leg cramps. Peaceful sleep... maybe too sleepy?
customer_reviews.text: I was taking magnesium while pregnant for leg cramps, regularity, and sleep. It worked well for all those things but I do find I am very sleepy throughout the day. I take 400mg at night before bed. Granted, I was pregnant and have a newborn now so sleepy might not be from the magnesium.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Agnew

customer_reviews.title: Smell
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this supplement for a while and was pretty satisfied with it. However, the recent bottle has a very unpleasant rancid smell. Hopefully, this is the only bottle with this issue.
customer_reviews.author: dino

customer_reviews.title: This is a reminder to myself actually ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these anymore. Not only tastes horrible there is a powder all over.
customer_reviews.author: MALLORY900

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Great supplement, I use this sometimes to help get a good nights sleep, and it really does work. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I get these for my mom and she loves them.

customer_reviews.title: keeps things movin
customer_reviews.text: great reputable company helps relax your muscles inside and out

customer_reviews.title: Magnesium
customer_reviews.text: Magnesium supplements are SO IMPORTANT for heart health do the research chelated is best

customer_reviews.title: Good supplement
customer_reviews.text: Solaray products have always been satisfactory. They are now using vegetarian cellulose capsuls. Magnesium is necessary to over-all good health and can sometimes help with highpertension, ahrythmia, and other health issues.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for at a great price.

customer_reviews.title: Dosage amount and mg's is stated correctly.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. I capsule of 200mg. Great product!

customer_reviews.title: High quality and a great price
customer_reviews.text: High quality and a great price. Really helps relieve muscle pain and cramps.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Will be buying again when we are close to running out!

customer_reviews.title: This product had helped me tremendously with cramping!
customer_reviews.text: This product had helped me tremendously with cramping ! I will continue to purchase because of it's purity with no fillers or binders💛

customer_reviews.title: Feeling wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this for four years! Feeling wonderful!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I take three a day ... Received it well packaged. Would order it again

customer_reviews.title: Solid choice
customer_reviews.text: Our go to source for Magnesium for several years now

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Met my expectations, I have using it for many years.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great product!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was really fast! These last for quite a bit! They help make me regular and what more could I ask for? Love the quality of this brand and product!
customer_reviews.author: Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We have been buying this for several months now and like it. I tried other brands and nothing is the same. I have even forgotten to take these at night and definitely noticed! It's a great buy!

product_meta.title: Solaray Magnesium Amino Acid Chelate Complex 200 mg | Healthy Heart, Muscle, Nerve & Circulatory Function Support | Special Herb Base | 100 VegCaps
feature_bullets: A Mega Mineral: Involved in 300+ enzymatic reactions, magnesium supports healthy heart & nerves
High Absorption: Magnesium reacted w/ aspartic acid, citric acid, glycine & whole rice concentrate
Better Base: Organic alfalfa & parsley herb base included for additional nutritive support
Trusted Brand: Non-GMO, vegan and free of artificial colors, flavors & preservatives
Customers Say: This is the best magnesium supplement I have tried and would recommend it...
